aspecttable.name: BNSF-1996
aspecttable.reference: As described in the BNSF System Special Instructions All Subdivisions No1. In effect at 0001 Central, Mountain and Pacific Continental Time, Thursday August 1, 1996.

aspect.name: Clear
aspect.indication: Proceed

aspect.name: Approach Limited
aspect.indication: Proceed prepared to pass next signal not exceeding 60 MPH and be prepared to enter diverging route at prescribed speed.

aspect.name: Advance Approach
aspect.indication: Proceed prepared to pass next signal not exceeding 50 MPH and be prepared to enter diverging route at prescribed speed.

aspect.name: Approach Medium (Diverging)
aspect.indication: Proceed prepared to pass next signal not exceeding 40 MPH and be prepared to enter diverging route at prescribed speed.

aspect.name: Approach Medium
aspect.indication: Proceed prepared to pass next signal not exceeding 40 MPH and be prepared to enter diverging route at prescribed speed.

aspect.name: Approach Restricting
aspect.indication: Proceed prepared to pass next signal at restricted speed.

aspect.name: Approach
aspect.indication: Proceed prepared to stop at next signal, trains exceeding 30 MPH immediately reduce to that speed.

aspect.name: Diverging Clear
aspect.indication: Proceed on diverging route not exceeding prescribed speed through turnout. (Prescribed speed is 60 MPH).

aspect.name: Diverging Clear (Fifty)
aspect.indication: Proceed on diverging route not exceeding prescribed speed through turnout. (Prescribed speed is 50 MPH).

aspect.name: Diverging Clear (Medium)
aspect.indication: Proceed on diverging route not exceeding prescribed speed through turnout. (Prescribed speed is 40 MPH and route is primary divergance).

aspect.name: Diverging Clear (Slow)
aspect.indication: Proceed on diverging route not exceeding prescribed speed through turnout. (Prescribed speed is 40 MPH or less and route is secondary divergance).

aspect.name: Diverging Approach Diverging
aspect.indication: Proceed on diverging route not exceeding prescribed speed through turnout prepared to advance on diverging route at the next signal not exceeding prescribed speed through turnout. (Prescribed speed is 60 MPH).

aspect.name: Diverging Approach Diverging (Fifty)
aspect.indication: Proceed on diverging route not exceeding prescribed speed through turnout prepared to advance on diverging route at the next signal not exceeding prescribed speed through turnout. (Prescribed speed is 50 MPH).

aspect.name: Diverging Approach Diverging (Medium)
aspect.indication: Proceed on diverging route not exceeding prescribed speed through turnout prepared to advance on diverging route at the next signal not exceeding prescribed speed through turnout. (Prescribed speed is 40 MPH or less).

aspect.name: Diverging Approach Medium
aspect.indication: Proceed on diverging route not exceeding prescribed speed through turnout prepared to pass next signal not exceeding 35 MPH.

aspect.name: Diverging Approach
aspect.indication: Proceed on diverging route not exceeding prescribed speed through turnout, approach next signal preparing to stop. Trains exceeding 30 MPH immediately reduce to that speed. (Route is primary divergance).

aspect.name: Diverging Approach (Slow)
aspect.indication: Proceed on diverging route not exceeding prescribed speed through turnout prepared to stop at next signal, trains exceeding 30 MPH immediately reduce to that speed. (Route is secondary divergance).

aspect.name: Restricting
aspect.indication: Proceed at restricted speed.

aspect.name: Restricting (Diverging)
aspect.indication: Proceed at restricted speed. (Route is diverging).

aspect.name: Stop and Proceed
aspect.indication: Stop, then proceed at restricted speed.

aspect.name: Stop
aspect.indication: Stop.

aspect.name: Unlit
aspect.indication: Unlit
